programme.title: Quando Explode a Vingança, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Juan Miranda é um camponês rude com coração de Robin Hood. Sean Mallory é um revolucionário irlandês que é especialista em dinamite e vive agora no México.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: Renegado Impiedoso, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Pardon Chato é um índio Apache mestiço que vive na linha entre duas culturas, balanceando a sua tribo com o encantamento que tem pelo mundo dos brancos.

programme.title: Terra Bruta, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendário John Ford une-se à estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a história tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o território dos Comanches para resgatar reféns cativos da tribo.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: Jake Grandão, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que já viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ação quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: A Última Exorcista, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois que um estranho acontecimento faz com que todos os padres treinados em exorcismos de uma pequena cidade morram atacados, Joan Campbell deve lutar contra demônios de seu passado que, desta vez, possuíram sua irmã.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Delivery Macabro, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Uma entregadora de pizza com problemas financeiros precisa lutar por sua vida quando sua última entrega da noite acaba sendo para um grupo de satanistas da alta sociedade que precisam de uma virgem para um sacrifício.

programme.title: Apartamento 3D - O mal mora ao lado, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tudo parece perfeito para Erin e Ben depois que eles se mudam para um novo apartamento em Nova York, até que um estranho fica obcecado por eles.

programme.title: Incisões Perigosas, (2020, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A blogueira de beleza Alexa Landry só tinha um medo: a cirurgia plástica. Quando ela é sequestrada com seus amigos pelo Dr. Cunningham, um cirurgião plástico perturbado, obcecado em embelezar suas vítimas, seu maior medo se torna realidade.

programme.title: A Maldição do Titanic, (2022, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos após um dos maiores desastres da história, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural até os destroços do navio original. Mas forças sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaçam repetir a história.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino médio se reúnem para uma noite de diversão no Central Park. O que eles ainda não sabem é que um assassino mascarado está à solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingança em prática.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: A Última Exorcista, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois que um estranho acontecimento faz com que todos os padres treinados em exorcismos de uma pequena cidade morram atacados, Joan Campbell deve lutar contra demônios de seu passado que, desta vez, possuíram sua irmã.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Pegadas na neve, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: O perigo ronda uma montanha de neve. Cinco pessoas exploram uma região nos alpes em busca de uma planta com propriedades medicinais.

programme.title: O Dia Da Múmia, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack Wells explora a tumba do rei Neferu na esperança de recuperar um diamante lendário quando a múmia do rei retornar dos mortos em busca de vítimas humanas.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Busca de Vingança, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em um conto clássico de Edgar Allan Poe, este filme desafia a percepção da realidade. Busca de Vingança nos mostra como Edgar torna se uma força de terror contra qualquer um que está entre ele e seu desejo de vingança.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis, (2019, Zombies)
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econômico na Croácia, o mundo mudou e agora a água é rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles terão que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: Miuga entrega uma mensagem para Totosai. Ele diz que a Tessaiga ficará mais forte se cortar derrotar um poderoso youkai. O grupo procura então os youkais morcegos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mãe e os Sentimentos de Shiori

programme.title: O youkai morcego tenta destruir a aldeia junto com a mãe de Shiori. Inuyasha é bloqueado pela barreira da menina e não consegue derrotá-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Tessaiga Vermelha que Quebra a Barreira

programme.title: A tribo youkais Gatos do Fogo ataca do oeste. Seu objetivo é obter os fragmentos da Jóia de Agome, bem como se vingar de Sesshomaru e Inuyasha, filhos do grande cão youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conspiração dos Quatro Youkais Gatos de Fogo

programme.title: Inuyasha corta a barreira e junto com o Kuga, eles entram no castelo. Enquanto isso, Mirok e Sango caíram sob um feitiço, e Agome está presa em uma prisão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Alvos são Sesshomaru e Inuyasha

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, começa a se mover com o poder da Jóia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a múmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos

programme.title: Sango é convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrás. Kuranosuke tem aparência, status e riqueza. Sango está confusa sobre como ela recusará sua proposta de casamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A Tessaiga está equipada com uma técnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roubá-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga

programme.title: Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolverá Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai até o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presença da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin

programme.title: Narak está tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak vê que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela está ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango está preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Conexão Entre o Presente e a Época das Guerras

programme.title: Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que é sua noiva. Mas Kuga é loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrás dele e é atacada por um youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Youkai Loba e a Grande Promessa

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela não tem intenção de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrás dos fragmentos da Jóia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que é uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vão ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Aumento da Energia Maligna; A Cabeça do Demônio

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o porão com a princesa e vai atrás dele. Agome encontra o cadáver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que está gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que estão destruindo campos. Eles encontram três macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Três Youkais do Deus Macaco

programme.title: Agome pega um resfriado e retorna aos dias atuais. Inuyasha está preocupado com ela. Ele reúne muitos alimentos nutritivos derrotando vários youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Confronto Entre Inuyasha e Hojo

programme.title: O irmão mais novo de Agome, Sota, se apaixonou por Hitomi, uma colega de classe. Inicialmente, ele pede a Inuyasha um conselho, mas no final, ele decide dizer a ela que a ama com um plano orquestrado por Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Tesso, um youkai de rato que tem medo de gatos, se transforma em um curandeiro e persegue Kuroro. Inuyasha e seu grupo encontram aldeões que confundem Kirara com Kuroro e tentam expulsá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Espiritualista Mistérioso e a Kirara Negra

programme.title: Kikyo foi trazida de volta à vida por uma das técnicas secretas de Urasue. Ela conhece Monju, que está na mesma situação. Monju não tem almas suficientes.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.title: Agome e os outros são sequestrados por youkais que estão usando falsas Jóias. Inuyasha vai salvá-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Conheça o gângster atrás do muro

programme.title: Giorno luta contra o Stand de Polpo, que pode se movimentar livremente pelas sombras. Koichi conta a Giorno sobre a flecha que produz um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Em busca da fortuna de Polpo!

programme.title: Com o desaparecimento misterioso da tripulação de Bucciarati no convés, Abbacchio lança seu Stand, Moody Jazz, para investigar esse preocupante fenômeno.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O bando descobre que sua chegada a Capri reserva um perigo. Com Giorno, Mista começa a neutralizar o inimigo com seu Stands, o Six Bullets.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mista é atraído para um caminhão em movimento. Nele, o Stand de Sale, Arts & Crafts, mostra sua habilidade de controlar as balas do Six Bullet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati entrega as joias de Polpo ao Chefe, Pericolo, e é promovido a caporegime da Passione.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Durante uma operação, Narancia é interceptado por Formaggio, membro do Time de Assassinos, que encolhe o capanga usando os poderes de Tiny Feet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Narancia, cada vez menor, tenta se manter vivo enquanto Formaggio continua a pressioná-lo para descobrir o paradeiro da filha do chefe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati envia Giorno e seus homens para as ruínas de Pompeia, onde um confronto com Illuso prende Fugo em um mundo de espelhos sem seu Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Abbacchio tenta recuperar a chave para transferir a filha do chefe para um lugar seguro, mas antes ele precisa enfrentar Illuso no mundo dos espelhos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com ordens para embarcar em um trem com destino a Florença, a equipe de Bucciarati não conseguem descobrir como usar a chave, e os assassinos estão se aproximando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A equipe de Bucciarati está envelhecendo rápido por causa de um ataque desconhecido. Mista aparece para investigar, mas logo é surpreendido por um Stand Beach Boy.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Halvdan é um menino diferente, longe do tipo ideal de viking para sua aldeia. Quando ele conhece Meia, a filha do chefe da tribo inimiga, começa uma incrível aventura sobre amizade e superação de diferenças.

programme.title: D Artagnan O Quarto Mosqueteiro, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: O Jovem Viking, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Halvdan é um menino diferente, longe do tipo ideal de viking para sua aldeia. Quando ele conhece Meia, a filha do chefe da tribo inimiga, começa uma incrível aventura sobre amizade e superação de diferenças.

programme.title: D Artagnan O Quarto Mosqueteiro, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: Combate, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um jovem lutador deve decidir seu destino; desistir de tudo e treinar para honra e glória ou sucumbir à vida de um lutador de jaula por um mafioso russo.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, and Angela Lansbury headline an all-star cast in this daring thriller rife with political intrigue, mental manipulation, and a diabolical plot that may lead to the highest levels of the government.

programme.title: King Creole, (1958, Musical)
programme.desc: Elvis Presley gives Bourbon Street a new beat in King Creole. He plays a troubled youth whose singing sets the French Quarter rockin’.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: His mother (Angela Lansbury) expects him to climb the corporate ladder. But Elvis would rather wear an aloha shirt than a white collar, so he goes to work as a tour guide. Lucky Elvis: his first customers are a car full of cuties.

programme.title: Fun in Acapulco, (1963, Musical)
programme.desc: Elvis heads south of the border, where he’s fired as a boat hand, hired as a lifeguard and singer, admired by local beauties and inspired to jump off a 136-foot cliff. Put another way: he overcomes a fear of heights in spectacular fashion.

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny, (1966, Musical)
programme.desc: Join Elvis Presley and Donna Douglas for a riverboat ride of rollicking musical entertainment in this charming and sassy comic hit about a gambler and his lady love.

programme.title: Clambake, (1967, Musical)
programme.desc: The king of rock 'n' roll, Elvis Presley, is as a lonely million-heir who gives up his fortune and trades identities with a water ski instructor to learn about life from the bottom up in this musical romp! Bill Bixby and Shelley Fabares also star.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: The Caddy, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this zany farce, Harvey is a shy but talented pro golfer who, because he can't face the crowds, coaxes his buddy Joe into a big-time tournament. As Joe's caddy, Harvey is a disaster, and the two have a hilarious quarrel.

programme.title: Artists and Models, (1955, Comedy)
programme.desc: A goonish young man receives telepathic top secret information in his nightmares, which are used by his artist friend in comic strips. Foreign agents and the CIA get interested.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Death Warrant, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: On the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and her father's disappearance, Heather discovers she is not who she thinks she is. The revelation leads her deep into a demonic world that threatens to trap her in Silent Hill forever.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Let Me In (2010), (2011, Vampires)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chloë Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Mid-Century, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award Nominee Bruce Dern and Stephen Lang star in this horror tale about a couple renting a vacation home who meet the spirits of the architect and his two wives—plus their deranged, living son.

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the room—but when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Set's Alessi, Part 1
programme.desc: With Joseph and Avdol busy fighting Mariah, Jotaro and Polnareff get concerned about why they haven't shown up yet. As the two search Luxor, Polnareff senses someone following them and confronts the man.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Set's Alessi, Part 2
programme.desc: The power of Alessi's Stand "Set" has turned Polnareff back into a child, leaving him confused and alone. A passerby named Marena takes the boy into her home to help him, but they are followed by Alessi and his terrible powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 1
programme.desc: After a long journey, Jotaro and his friends finally reach Cairo. They begin asking about the location of DIO's palace and find one man who says he has information, but will only answer if the group can beat him in a game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 2
programme.desc: After losing to D'Arby, Joseph and Polnareff have their souls taken. In order to have their souls returned, Jotaro shows off Star Platinum's powers before beginning a match with D'Arby, warning him that cheating won't work.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 1
programme.desc: Hol Horse arrives at Cairo in order to pursue Jotaro and the others. He has joined forces with another partner and is after the lives of Jotaro and crew once more. What's more, his new partner is none other than Mondatta.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
programme.desc: Following Mondatta's prediction, Hol Horse sticks his fingers into Polnareff's nose, but he doesn't know what to do from there. Making matters worse, Jotaro and the others show up in search of Polnareff, forcing Hol Horse into a tough spot.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and his friends continue to search for DIO's mansion in Cairo. Following Avdol's advice, they have a beggar look for the mansion and wait. Meanwhile, Iggy, wandering the city alone, is confronted by two large dogs.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2
programme.desc: Iggy ends up in a battle to the death in the sewers against Pet Shop, the falcon that guards DIO's mansion. Despite being injured, Iggy runs to the river in an attempt to escape, but he may have underestimated Pet Shop's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 1
programme.desc: Though purchased dearly with Iggy's injury, Jotaro and his group finally have the location of DIO's palace. Waiting for them where they find the butler, Darby Younger, brother of the gambler they previously defeated.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 2
programme.desc: The battle for souls with D'Arby continues. Kakyoin challenges D'Arby to a racing game but ends up losing both the race and his soul. Before Joseph really has time to react, Jotaro picks the next game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
programme.desc: The baseball game with D'Arby continues within DIO's mansion. For some reason, Jotaro starts telling D'Arby what pitches he'll be throwing. D'Arby finds Jotaro's actions strange, but still believes he has the upper hand because of his Stand's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2
programme.desc: After a long, hard journey, the group is suddenly faced with saying goodbye to a friend. Polnareff can't control his emotions and starts brandishing his sword toward an unseen enemy with very little success.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3
programme.desc: Polnareff is pushed to his limits by Cool Ice's merciless attacks. As he awaits death, the dying Iggy manages to save him at the last minute. Polnareff then stabs Cool Ice in the head. Despite showing resilience to the attacks so far.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 1
programme.desc: Polnareff finally comes face-to-face with DIO. Despite Polnareff's hostility, DIO offers to forgive him and allow the Frenchman to join his side again. Polnareff refuses, but for some reason, he cannot get any closer to DIO.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 2
programme.desc: As night falls, the battle expands to encompass the whole city of Cairo. Amidst the melee, Kakyoin says he has a way to figure out DIO's Stand ability.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 3
programme.desc: Thanks to Kakyoin, Joseph is able to figure out that DIO's Stand, "The World," has the power to stop time, but is quickly defeated by DIO. Jotaro then attacks The World with Star Platinum but is no match for DIO's power.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: With help from Polnareff as well as putting his own life on the line, Jotaro is finally able to land a blow on DIO. Finding the shriveled body of Joseph Joestar, Jotaro becomes enraged and wages his final, desperate battle with DIO!

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: With only one more day remaining until the selection, Gon, Killua and Ikalgo go over their strategy.
programme.sub-title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Welfin, a wolf-like Chimera Ant, has realized that someone has infiltrated the palace. With his sharp sense of smell, he tracks down the intruders.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The battle between the humans and Chimera Ants is about to begin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Zeno and Netero's sudden attack throws the palace into confusion. Concerned for the King's safety, Pitou and Pouf hurry to the King's side.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Youpi transforms and splits up the group with his attack. Morel lets Shoot and Knuckle handle things while he heads for the King.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King faces off against Netero and Zeno.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle suddenly appears before Youpi to fight him head on.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Zeno's cryptic words to Killua and Gon becomes clear when they reach the tower.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Feeling the need to lay a punch on Youpi to avenge his friend Shoot, Knuckle decides to take on Youpi once more.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Ikalgo reads Palm's hidden message, which says that she has gone to the palace and to assume that she is dead if she does not respond before the start of the mission.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Youpi is impressed by the extermination team's abilities and acknowledges their strength.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Morel destroys the cocoon before him, but as he suspected, Pouf is not inside.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon waits for Neferpitou to finish healing Komugi with Doctor Blythe, while Morel fights Youpi. The battle finally advances to the final stage!

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The battle between the King and the Chairman is finally about to begin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Ikalgo remembers his mission to find Palm.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua confronts Palm.

programme.title: Dreamgirls, (2006, Musical)
programme.desc: With showstopping performances by a star-studded cast, Dreamgirls soars with the amazing story of three female singers who learn that anything is possible when you hold on to your dreams.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: A sassy, confident woman must use all her wiles to have any hope of bringing her man back . . . while keeping her pride intact.

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspired by his fiancée (who dumped him), a man publishes a break-up hand-book for men, becoming a best-selling author in the process.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

programme.title: Replicant, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme squares off against his deadliest opponent yet -- himself -- when he stars as both a heinous serial killer and the replicated clone that scientists have constructed in order to kill him.

programme.title: Slaughter In San Francisco [English-Language Version], (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A Chinese-American cop, skilled in martial arts, battles the most powerful criminal gang in San Francisco that is responsible for the death of his partner.

programme.title: Good Guys Wear Black, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Chuck Norris stars as John T. Booker, the former leader of an elite commando unit who must uncover the reason why his former squad members are being systematically murdered one by one. Anne Archer and James Franciscus co-star.

programme.title: A Force Of One, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: In this thrill-a-minute film, action superstar Chuck Norris stars as a martial arts champion enlisted to help track down a serial killer...and the man responsible for the murder of his adoptive son. Jennifer O'Neill and Clu Gulager also star.

programme.title: The Octagon, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris is back in this action-packed martial arts showcase co-starring the legendary Lee Van Cleef. Norris takes on his adoptive brother and a training camp where terrorists are being taught the secret killing techniques of the ninja!

programme.title: An Eye For An Eye, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: A SFPD undercover narcotics cop aims to avenge his partner's death and destroy a drug-smuggling ring operated by the Chinese Triads.

programme.title: Lone Wolf McQuade, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: A maverick Texas Ranger throws down his guns to indulge his talents in the martial arts when he meets his match in the leader of a gun-smuggling ring.

programme.title: Missing In Action, (1984, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: American servicemen are still being held captive in Vietnam – and it's up to one man to bring them home in this blistering, fast-paced action/adventure starring martial arts superstar Chuck Norris.

programme.title: Missing In Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris returns as James Braddock in this action-packed prequel to the original hit film. As war rages in Vietnam, Braddock and his men are captured and imprisoned. With fists and sheer courage, he must become an army of one to save his men.

programme.title: Ghostbusters, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A trio of university parasychologists lose their research grant and decide to open their own business, "Ghostbusters," and almost at once are summoned to investigate the strange happenings in a Central Park West apartment.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ace Ventura Pet Detective is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eye to eye with sharks, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. He always gets his man...or beast.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: The Animal, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe cop suffers a horrible car accident, and is repaired by a mad scientist who uses animal parts. Problems arise when the animal parts begin to take over.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

programme.title: The Cable Guy, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Out-of-control comedy features Jim Carrey at his hilarious best as a hard-wired cable installer just looking for a friend. Matthew Broderick co-stars.

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: It Had to Be You, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Two strangers meet and fall in love during the weekend that they are planning their respective weddings.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Blended, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: After a disastrous blind date, single parents Jim and Lauren never want to see each other again. But when they each sign up separately for a family vacation, they find themselves stuck sharing a suite at a luxurious African safari resort.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Pacific Heights, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: A young interracial couple move into their dream home and are increasingly harassed by their next-door neighbor, a tightly wound black LAPD officer. When the couple decides to fight back the feud turns deadly.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Obsessed, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: Successful financial advisor Derek Charles’ life seems perfect. But when a beautiful temp, Lisa, joins the firm, Derek's life takes a strange turn. After a misunderstood encounter at the company holiday party, Lisa begins to spiral out of control.

programme.title: Pet, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A young waitress engages in psychological warfare with the lonely man who abducts her, revealing the darkness lurking in each of them.

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road, (2008, Romance)
programme.desc: This mesmerizing and moving story follows the lives of a young couple living in suburban Connecticut who decide to risk everything to pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Big Fish, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Throughout his life, Edward Bloom (Ewan McGregor) has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: The Master, (2012, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: Trumbo, (2007, Documentary)
programme.desc: Trumbo documents the rise of Dalton Trumbo's career in Hollywood, and his subsequent public humiliation from being among the "Hollywood Ten" blacklisted by the House Un-American Activities Committee in the 1940s for communist associations.

programme.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Ricky is a defiant young city kid who finds himself on the run with his cantankerous foster uncle in the wild New Zealand bush. A national manhunt ensues, and the two are forced to put aside their differences and work together.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Mermaids, (1990, Romance)
programme.desc: A sexy and unpredictable single mother of two is a source of constant embarrassment to her confused 15-year-old daughter, who's trying to deal with her own sexual awakening.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Starring Yul Brynner and a stellar supporting cast that includes Robert Fuller, Warren Oates, and Claude Akins, this classic western adventure follows the legendary Magnificent Seven as they thunder through Mexico to face the shootout of their lives!

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Noah, (2014, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. "This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.title: Push, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Superhumans defy a government plot to harness and abuse their powers. Chris Evans and Dakota Fanning (the TWILIGHT films) team in a pulse-pounding paranormal thriller.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Bad Teacher, (2011, Comedy)
programme.desc: After Elizabeth's plan to ditch her teaching job and marry her wealthy fiance backfires, she must act fast to lock down a new rich guy - no matter how many scams she has to pull.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Support the Girls, (2018, Comedy)
programme.desc: Regina Hall (Girls Trip) stars as the manager of a "sports bar with curves." She runs the joint like a family, but over the course of one challenging day her incurable optimism is tested by sketchy employees, bad customers and an even worse boss.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.title: Ghostbusters, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A trio of university parasychologists lose their research grant and decide to open their own business, "Ghostbusters," and almost at once are summoned to investigate the strange happenings in a Central Park West apartment.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Kalifornia, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: A graduate student and his girlfriend set out on a cross-country road trip to research a book they are writing on serial killers. Along the way, they pick up an ex-con and his girlfriend who will take them on a ride they'll never forget.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: May, (2003, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc:
May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.
Rated R

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: While Donna and Vic Trenton struggle to save their rocky marriage, their son Tad befriends the loveable 200-lb St. Bernard who belongs to their mechanic.

programme.title: Children Of The Corn: Genesis, (2011, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An update of the horror classic that follows a couple who take a cross-country road trip to work out their marital issues and end up falling victim to a cult of killer children in an abandoned Nebraska town.

programme.title: Children Of The Corn: Runaway, (2018, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An evil cult of children who kill, stalks a woman and her son.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Invasion U.S.A., (1985, Action)
programme.desc: An army of terrorist mercenaries led by Soviet agent Rostov catches America unprepared and makes it a war zone from sea to shining sea. Only one man can stem the rising tide of violence: retired agent and martial arts expert Matt Hunter.

programme.title: Missing In Action, (1984, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: American servicemen are still being held captive in Vietnam – and it's up to one man to bring them home in this blistering, fast-paced action/adventure starring martial arts superstar Chuck Norris.

programme.title: Missing In Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris returns as James Braddock in this action-packed prequel to the original hit film. As war rages in Vietnam, Braddock and his men are captured and imprisoned. With fists and sheer courage, he must become an army of one to save his men.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing In Action III, (1988, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: When Colonel James Braddock (Chuck Norris, "Missing in Action") is told that his wife and 12-year-old son are still alive in Communist Vietnam, he mounts a one-man assault to free them…armed with the latest high-tech firepower, of course!

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners (1999), (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Neil Simon comedy that follows a couple's mishaps as they travel to New York for a job interview. A series of comedic disasters follow that might make one think twice before visiting the Big Apple.

programme.title: Forces of Nature, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben is trying to get to Savannah for his wedding. A seagull flies into the engine as his plane is taking off. All later flights are canceled because of an approaching hurricane, so he hitches a ride in with an attractive woman named Sara.

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: In & Out, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: A former student who's now an actor tells an audience of millions that Howard is gay. He's outed when he didn't know he was in! Kevin Kline plays Howard, scrambling to go forth with his wedding and doing his best to assert his manliness.

programme.title: Pretty In Pink, (1986, Romance)
programme.desc: She’s a high school girl from the wrong side of town. He’s the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, it’s threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.title: D.A.R.Y.L., (1985, Adventure)
programme.desc: A young boy is found wandering without any memory of who he is. A family takes him in and begin to look for clues to help him find his way home.

programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.
